name: Otter and Owl
description:
A wholesome game in which the player takes control of one animal to hunt for food. According to the topic of duality, the other animal, controlled by the computer, uses its specific abilities to help the player.

This game was created within 48 hours as part of the Global Game Jam 2022 in Dundee (Scotland).

If you like the game, please consider donating to a wild animal trust to help of your choice. For example: https://ukwildottertrust.org/
